titleStmt.title: Bridge Phase 2: Witness fMS, Collation unit C12

body.ab: <milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0065__main__1"/> "Dear, dear Elizabeth" I exclaimed <lb n="c56-0065__main__2"/> when I had read her letter"–I will write <lb n="c56-0065__main__3"/> instantly and relieve them from the <lb n="c56-0065__main__4"/> great pain they must feel."<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0065__main__5"/> I wrote, and this exertion greatly <lb n="c56-0065__main__6"/> fatigued me; b<mdel>y</mdel>ut my convalescence <del loc="c56-0065__main__d1e12190__Start"/>was<del loc="c56-0065__main__d1e12190__End"/><lb n="c56-0065__left_margin__1"/>had<lb n="c56-0065__main__7"/> commenced and <del loc="c56-0065__main__d1e12206__Start"/>went on<del loc="c56-0065__main__d1e12206__End"/>proceeded regularly–in <lb n="c56-0065__main__8"/> another fortnight I was able to <lb n="c56-0065__main__9"/> leave my chamber. <lb n="c56-0065__main__10"/><metamark function="separate">______</metamark><lb n="c56-0066__main__1"/><milestone spanTo="#c56-0066.05" unit="tei:head"/>Chap. 8th<lb n="c56-0066__main__2"/> one of my first duties on my recovery was <lb n="c56-0066__main__3"/> to introduce Clerval to the <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>several professors of <lb n="c56-0066__main__4"/> the university. And in doing this I under <lb n="c56-0066__main__5"/> went <del loc="c56-0066__main__d1e12255__Start"/>torments<del loc="c56-0066__main__d1e12255__End"/> a kind of rough usage <lb n="c56-0066__main__6"/><del loc="c56-0066__main__d1e12259__Start"/>that<del loc="c56-0066__main__d1e12259__End"/> ill <del loc="c56-0066__main__d1e12263__Start"/>befitten<del loc="c56-0066__main__d1e12263__End"/> befitt<mdel>ed</mdel>ing the wounds that<lb n="c56-0066__main__7"/> my mind had sustained. Ever since the <lb n="c56-0066__main__8"/> fatal night – the end of my labours &<lb n="c56-0066__main__9"/> the beginning of my misfortunes <del loc="c56-0066__main__d1e12285__Start"/>(<del loc="c56-0066__main__d1e12285__End"/> I had <lb n="c56-0066__main__10"/> conceived a violent antipathy even to <lb n="c56-0066__main__11"/> the name of <mdel>Ch</mdel><del loc="c56-0066__main__d1e12298__Start"/>Chemistry<del loc="c56-0066__main__d1e12298__End"/>Natural Philosophy. When I was other<lb n="c56-0066__main__12"/>wise quite restored to health the sight of a<lb n="c56-0066__main__13"/> Chemical instrument brought on <lb n="c56-0066__main__14"/> againrenewed all <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>the agony of my my<metamark function="insert">^</metamark> nervous symtoms. <del loc="c56-0066__main__d1e12341__Start"/>Lo<del loc="c56-0066__main__d1e12341__End"/><lb n="c56-0066__main__15"/> Henry saw this and had <mdel>p</mdel><del loc="c56-0066__main__d1e12352__Start"/>packed up<del loc="c56-0066__main__d1e12352__End"/>removed<lb n="c56-0066__main__16"/> all my <del loc="c56-0066__main__d1e12363__Start"/>machines<del loc="c56-0066__main__d1e12363__End"/><del loc="c56-0066__main__d1e12366__Start"/>in a chest<del loc="c56-0066__main__d1e12366__End"/>apparatus from my <del loc="c56-0066__main__d1e12371__Start"/>che<del loc="c56-0066__main__d1e12371__End"/> view he had also <lb n="c56-0066__main__17"/> changed my <del loc="c56-0066__main__d1e12380__Start"/>room<del loc="c56-0066__main__d1e12380__End"/>ap<mdel>p</mdel>artment, for he perceived that <lb n="c56-0066__main__18"/> I had <mdel>a</mdel>acquired dislike to the room which had <lb n="c56-0066__main__19"/> previously been my workshop. But these <lb n="c56-0066__main__20"/> cares of Clerval were <del loc="c56-0066__main__d1e12408__Start"/>thrown away<del loc="c56-0066__main__d1e12408__End"/>made of no avail when <lb n="c56-0066__main__21"/> I visited the professors. even my excellent <lb n="c56-0066__main__22"/> M. Waldman inflicted torture when <lb n="c56-0066__main__23"/> he praised with <del loc="c56-0066__main__d1e12422__Start"/>the<del loc="c56-0066__main__d1e12422__End"/> kindness and warmth, <lb n="c56-0066__main__24"/> the astonishing progress that I had made <lb n="c56-0066__main__25"/> in the sciences. He soon perceived <mdel>my</mdel><lb n="c56-0066__left_margin__1"/>that I<lb n="c56-0066__main__26"/> disliked<del loc="c56-0066__main__d1e12448__Start"/>of<del loc="c56-0066__main__d1e12448__End"/> the subject, but not guessing <lb n="c56-0066__main__27"/> the real cause he attributed <mdel>to</mdel><mdel>it</mdel><lb n="c56-0066__left_margin__1"/>my feelings<lb n="c56-0066__main__28"/> to modesty <del loc="c56-0066__main__d1e12471__Start"/>on hearing myself praised<del loc="c56-0066__main__d1e12471__End"/><lb n="c56-0067__main__1"/><del loc="c56-0067__main__d1e12479__Start"/>he therefore<del loc="c56-0067__main__d1e12479__End"/><lb n="c56-0067__left_margin__1"/>and changed the subject from <lb n="c56-0067__main__2"/> my improvement, to the science itself, <lb n="c56-0067__main__3"/> with <del loc="c56-0067__main__d1e12492__Start"/>an<del loc="c56-0067__main__d1e12492__End"/> a desire as I evidently saw <lb n="c56-0067__main__4"/> of drawing <del loc="c56-0067__main__d1e12498__Start"/>friend<del loc="c56-0067__main__d1e12498__End"/> me out. <del loc="c56-0067__main__d1e12501__Start"/>K<del loc="c56-0067__main__d1e12501__End"/>Kind <lb n="c56-0067__main__5"/> friend he tortured me withoutbut <lb n="c56-0067__main__6"/> it<del loc="c56-0067__main__d1e12517__Start"/>How cruel is<del loc="c56-0067__main__d1e12517__End"/> What could I do? <lb n="c56-0067__main__7"/> He meant to please <del loc="c56-0067__main__d1e12522__Start"/>and<del loc="c56-0067__main__d1e12522__End"/><del loc="c56-0067__main__d1e12526__Start"/>me<del loc="c56-0067__main__d1e12526__End"/>& he <lb n="c56-0067__main__8"/><del loc="c56-0067__main__d1e12532__Start"/>tortured<del loc="c56-0067__main__d1e12532__End"/><lb n="c56-0067__left_margin__1"/>tormented me <del loc="c56-0067__main__d1e12545__Start"/>it was<del loc="c56-0067__main__d1e12545__End"/>I felt as if he <del loc="c56-0067__main__d1e12552__Start"/>had<del loc="c56-0067__main__d1e12552__End"/><lb n="c56-0067__main__9"/><lb n="c56-0067__left_margin__1"/>placed carefully one by one <del loc="c56-0067__main__d1e12564__Start"/>placed<del loc="c56-0067__main__d1e12564__End"/> in my <lb n="c56-0067__main__10"/> view those instruments which were <lb n="c56-0067__main__11"/><lb n="c56-0067__left_margin__1"/>to be afterwards used in putting me to a <lb n="c56-0067__main__12"/> slow and cruel <del loc="c56-0067__main__d1e12580__Start"/>dre<del loc="c56-0067__main__d1e12580__End"/> death. I writhed <lb n="c56-0067__main__13"/> under his words, yet dared not shew <lb n="c56-0067__main__14"/><del loc="c56-0067__main__d1e12586__Start"/>my<del loc="c56-0067__main__d1e12586__End"/> the pain I felt. Clerval, whose <lb n="c56-0067__main__15"/> eyes and feelings were always quick <lb n="c56-0067__main__16"/> in discerning the sensations of others <lb n="c56-0067__main__17"/> declined the subject alledging <mdel>in</mdel><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>his<lb n="c56-0067__main__18"/> ignorance & the conversation took <lb n="c56-0067__main__19"/> a more general turn. I thanked him <lb n="c56-0067__main__20"/> from my heart, but I did not speak. <lb n="c56-0067__main__21"/> I plainly saw that he was surprised, <lb n="c56-0067__main__22"/> but he never attempted to draw <lb n="c56-0067__main__23"/> my secret from me, and although <lb n="c56-0067__main__24"/> I loved him with a mixture of <lb n="c56-0067__main__25"/><del loc="c56-0067__main__d1e12630__Start"/>love<del loc="c56-0067__main__d1e12630__End"/><lb n="c56-0067__left_margin__1"/>affection and reverence that knew no <lb n="c56-0067__main__26"/> bounds, yet I could never <del loc="c56-0067__main__d1e12644__Start"/>pr<del loc="c56-0067__main__d1e12644__End"/> persuade <lb n="c56-0067__main__27"/> myself to confide to him that event <lb n="c56-0067__main__28"/> which was so often present to my <lb n="c56-0067__main__29"/> thoughts, but which I feared the detail <lb n="c56-0067__main__30"/> to another would only impress more deeply.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0068__main__1"/> Mr. Krempe was not <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>equally docile <del loc="c56-0068__main__d1e12677__Start"/>yet<del loc="c56-0068__main__d1e12677__End"/>&weak <lb n="c56-0068__main__2"/> as my illness had made me<lb n="c56-0068__left_margin__1"/> in my then <lb n="c56-0068__left_margin__2"/> condition of <lb n="c56-0068__left_margin__3"/> almost in<lb n="c56-0068__left_margin__4"/>supportable<lb n="c56-0068__left_margin__5"/> sensitiveness his harsh <lb n="c56-0068__main__3"/> blunt econiums gave me even more <lb n="c56-0068__main__4"/> pain <del loc="c56-0068__main__d1e12715__Start"/>that<del loc="c56-0068__main__d1e12715__End"/> than the benevolent <lb n="c56-0068__main__5"/> approbation of M. Waldman —"Dam<mdel>m</mdel>n<lb n="c56-0068__main__6"/> "the fellow," cried he "Why Mr. Clerval <lb n="c56-0068__main__7"/> "I tell you he has <del loc="c56-0068__main__d1e12737__Start"/>beaut<del loc="c56-0068__main__d1e12737__End"/> outstript <lb n="c56-0068__main__8"/> "us all– ay stare if you please but <lb n="c56-0068__main__9"/> "it is nevertheless true – A youngster <lb n="c56-0068__main__10"/> "who but <del loc="c56-0068__main__d1e12746__Start"/>two<del loc="c56-0068__main__d1e12746__End"/> three years ago believed <lb n="c56-0068__main__11"/> "Cornelius Agrippa <del loc="c56-0068__main__d1e12754__Start"/>to be<del loc="c56-0068__main__d1e12754__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>as firmly as the gospel has <lb n="c56-0068__main__12"/> "now set himself at the head of <lb n="c56-0068__main__13"/> "the university & if he is not soon <lb n="c56-0068__main__14"/> "pulled down we shall all be out <lb n="c56-0068__main__15"/> "of countenance.—Aye, Aye, continued <lb n="c56-0068__main__16"/> "he observing my <del loc="c56-0068__main__d1e12778__Start"/>countenance<del loc="c56-0068__main__d1e12778__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>faceex<lb n="c56-0068__main__17"/>pressive of suffering "Mr. <del loc="c56-0068__main__d1e12795__Start"/>f<del loc="c56-0068__main__d1e12795__End"/>Franken<lb n="c56-0068__main__18"/>stein is modest an excellent quality in <lb n="c56-0068__main__19"/> "a young man; Young men should be <lb n="c56-0068__main__20"/> "diffident of themselves you know Mr<lb n="c56-0068__main__21"/> "Clerval; I was myself when young but <lb n="c56-0068__main__22"/> "one soon grows out of that."<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0068__main__23"/> Mr Krempe had now commenced <lb n="c56-0068__main__24"/><del loc="c56-0068__main__d1e12830__Start"/>the subject of his own praise<del loc="c56-0068__main__d1e12830__End"/>an eulogy on himself and that <lb n="c56-0068__main__25"/> happily turned the conversation <lb n="c56-0068__main__26"/> from the subject that was so <del loc="c56-0068__main__d1e12843__Start"/>painful<del loc="c56-0068__main__d1e12843__End"/>agonizing<lb n="c56-0068__main__27"/> to me.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0068__main__28"/> Clerval was no natural philosopher. <lb n="c56-0068__main__29"/> His imagination was too vivid for<lb n="c56-0069__main__1"/> the minutiæ of science. <del loc="c56-0069__main__d1e12866__Start"/>La<del loc="c56-0069__main__d1e12866__End"/>Lan<lb n="c56-0069__main__2"/>guages were his <del loc="c56-0069__main__d1e12878__Start"/>chief<del loc="c56-0069__main__d1e12878__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>principal study for he <lb n="c56-0069__main__3"/> wished to open a field for <del loc="c56-0069__main__d1e12893__Start"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>him<del loc="c56-0069__main__d1e12893__End"/>self-instruc<lb n="c56-0069__main__4"/>tion on his return – <del loc="c56-0069__main__d1e12908__Start"/>Greek<del loc="c56-0069__main__d1e12908__End"/> Persian <lb n="c56-0069__main__5"/><del loc="c56-0069__main__d1e12912__Start"/>&<del loc="c56-0069__main__d1e12912__End"/> Arabic & Hebrew gained his atten<lb n="c56-0069__main__6"/>tion<del loc="c56-0069__main__d1e12924__Start"/>when<del loc="c56-0069__main__d1e12924__End"/><metamark function="displacement" xml:id="c56-0069.01">X</metamark><lb n="c56-0069__left_margin__1"/>so soon as <metamark function="displacement">X</metamark> he had become perfect<lb n="c56-0069__main__7"/>ly master of the Greek & Latin langua<lb n="c56-0069__main__8"/>ges. For my own part idleness had <lb n="c56-0069__main__9"/> ever been irksome to me and <lb n="c56-0069__main__10"/> now that I wished to fly from reflec<lb n="c56-0069__main__11"/>tion and hated my former studies <lb n="c56-0069__main__12"/><del loc="c56-0069__main__d1e12964__Start"/>a<del loc="c56-0069__main__d1e12964__End"/> I found great relief in being the <lb n="c56-0069__main__13"/> fellow pupil <mdel>of</mdel>with my <del loc="c56-0069__main__d1e12979__Start"/>fr<del loc="c56-0069__main__d1e12979__End"/> friend and <lb n="c56-0069__main__14"/><del loc="c56-0069__main__d1e12983__Start"/>I not a only<del loc="c56-0069__main__d1e12983__End"/> found <del loc="c56-0069__main__d1e12989__Start"/>instruct<del loc="c56-0069__main__d1e12989__End"/>not onlyinstruc<lb n="c56-0069__main__15"/>tion but consolation in the works of <lb n="c56-0069__main__16"/> the orientalists. <del loc="c56-0069__main__d1e13004__Start"/>There is something soothing<del loc="c56-0069__main__d1e13004__End"/><lb n="c56-0069__main__17"/> Their melancholy is soothing and their <lb n="c56-0069__main__18"/> joy elevating to a degree I never before <lb n="c56-0069__main__19"/> experienced in <del loc="c56-0069__main__d1e13016__Start"/>reading<del loc="c56-0069__main__d1e13016__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>studying<del loc="c56-0069__main__d1e13029__Start"/>any<del loc="c56-0069__main__d1e13029__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>the authors ofany other <del loc="c56-0069__main__d1e13045__Start"/>books.<del loc="c56-0069__main__d1e13045__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>country.<lb n="c56-0069__main__20"/> When you read<del loc="c56-0069__main__d1e13059__Start"/>s<del loc="c56-0069__main__d1e13059__End"/> their <del loc="c56-0069__main__d1e13062__Start"/>li<del loc="c56-0069__main__d1e13062__End"/> writings life <lb n="c56-0069__main__21"/> appears to consist in a warm sun <lb n="c56-0069__main__22"/> and gardens of roses – in the smiles &<lb n="c56-0069__main__23"/><del loc="c56-0069__main__d1e13074__Start"/>tears<del loc="c56-0069__main__d1e13074__End"/><lb n="c56-0069__left_margin__1"/>frowns of a fair enemy and the fire <lb n="c56-0069__main__24"/> that consumes your own heart <lb n="c56-0069__main__25"/> How different from the man<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>ly &<del loc="c56-0069__main__d1e13099__Start"/>warlike<del loc="c56-0069__main__d1e13099__End"/><lb n="c56-0069__main__26"/><lb n="c56-0069__left_margin__1"/>heroical poet<mdel>s</mdel>ry of Greece & Rome.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0069__main__27"/> Summer passed away in these <lb n="c56-0069__main__28"/><del loc="c56-0069__main__d1e13128__Start"/>studies<del loc="c56-0069__main__d1e13128__End"/><lb n="c56-0069__left_margin__1"/>occupations& my return to Geneva was <lb n="c56-0069__main__29"/> fixed for the latter end of Autum<mdel>m</mdel>n but<lb n="c56-0070__main__1"/> being delayed by several accidents winter <lb n="c56-0070__main__2"/>& snow arrived, <del loc="c56-0070__main__d1e13161__Start"/>and<del loc="c56-0070__main__d1e13161__End"/> the roads were <lb n="c56-0070__main__3"/> deemed impassable and my <del loc="c56-0070__main__d1e13168__Start"/>return<del loc="c56-0070__main__d1e13168__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>journey<lb n="c56-0070__main__4"/><del loc="c56-0070__main__d1e13183__Start"/>delayed<del loc="c56-0070__main__d1e13183__End"/><lb n="c56-0070__left_margin__1"/> was <lb n="c56-0070__left_margin__2"/> retarted untill the <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>ensuing spring. I felt this <lb n="c56-0070__main__5"/> delay very bitterly <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>for I longed to see my <lb n="c56-0070__main__6"/> native <mdel>c</mdel>town and my beloved friends <lb n="c56-0070__main__7"/><del loc="c56-0070__main__d1e13232__Start"/>and<del loc="c56-0070__main__d1e13232__End"/> my return had only been delayed <lb n="c56-0070__main__8"/> so long from an unwillingness to leave <lb n="c56-0070__main__9"/> Clerval in a strange town before he <lb n="c56-0070__main__10"/> had become acquainted with its in<lb n="c56-0070__main__11"/>habitants. The winter <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>however was <del loc="c56-0070__main__d1e13260__Start"/>however<del loc="c56-0070__main__d1e13260__End"/><mdel>s</mdel> spent<lb n="c56-0070__main__12"/><del loc="c56-0070__main__d1e13271__Start"/>a<del loc="c56-0070__main__d1e13271__End"/> cheerfully<del loc="c56-0070__main__d1e13277__Start"/>one<del loc="c56-0070__main__d1e13277__End"/> and although the <lb n="c56-0070__main__13"/> spring was uncommonly late when <lb n="c56-0070__main__14"/> it came its beauty compensated <lb n="c56-0070__main__15"/><del loc="c56-0070__main__d1e13286__Start"/>for<del loc="c56-0070__main__d1e13286__End"/> its dilatoriness. <del loc="c56-0070__main__d1e13289__Start"/>Ma<del loc="c56-0070__main__d1e13289__End"/> The month <lb n="c56-0070__main__16"/> of May was already <del loc="c56-0070__main__d1e13294__Start"/>finis<del loc="c56-0070__main__d1e13294__End"/><del loc="c56-0070__main__d1e13297__Start"/>end<del loc="c56-0070__main__d1e13297__End"/>com<lb n="c56-0070__main__17"/>pleated, and I expected daily the <lb n="c56-0070__main__18"/> letter that was to fix the date of <lb n="c56-0070__main__19"/> my <del loc="c56-0070__main__d1e13313__Start"/>return<del loc="c56-0070__main__d1e13313__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>departure, When Henry proposed <lb n="c56-0070__main__20"/> a pedestrian tour in environs of <lb n="c56-0070__main__21"/> Ingolstadt that I might bid farewell <lb n="c56-0070__main__22"/> to the country I had so long in<lb n="c56-0070__main__23"/>habited.– I acceeded with pleasure to <lb n="c56-0070__main__24"/> this propos<mdel>al</mdel><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>ition– I was fond of Exercise <lb n="c56-0070__main__25"/> and Clerval had always been my <lb n="c56-0070__main__26"/> favourite companion in <mdel>j</mdel><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>the rambles <lb n="c56-0070__main__27"/> of this nature that I had taken <lb n="c56-0070__main__28"/> among the scenes of my native coun<lb n="c56-0071__main__1"/> try. We passed a fortnight in these <lb n="c56-0071__main__2"/> perambulations. My health and spirits had long <lb n="c56-0071__main__3"/> been restored and they gained add<mdel>i</mdel>itional vigour <lb n="c56-0071__main__4"/> from the salubrious air<del loc="c56-0071__main__d1e13397__Start"/>,<metamark>X</metamark><del loc="c56-0071__main__d1e13397__End"/> I breathed, <metamark function="displacement" xml:id="c56-0071.01">X</metamark><lb n="c56-0071__left_margin__1"/> the natural <lb n="c56-0071__left_margin__2"/> incidents of <lb n="c56-0071__left_margin__3"/> our progress<metamark>X</metamark> and the <lb n="c56-0071__main__5"/> conversation of my friend. Study had before <lb n="c56-0071__main__6"/> rendered me unsocia<del loc="c56-0071__main__d1e13428__Start"/>ble<del loc="c56-0071__main__d1e13428__End"/>l, –Ihad shunned the <del loc="c56-0071__main__d1e13439__Start"/>face<del loc="c56-0071__main__d1e13439__End"/><lb n="c56-0071__main__7"/> company of my fellow beings But Clerval <lb n="c56-0071__main__8"/> called forth the better feelings of my heart. <lb n="c56-0071__main__9"/> he again taught me to love the aspect <lb n="c56-0071__main__10"/> of nature and the cheerful faces of chil<lb n="c56-0071__main__11"/>dren. Excellent Friend! How sincerely did you <lb n="c56-0071__main__12"/> love me and endeavour to elevate my <lb n="c56-0071__main__13"/> mind untill it was on a level with <lb n="c56-0071__main__14"/> your own. A selfish persuit<del loc="c56-0071__main__d1e13463__Start"/>e<del loc="c56-0071__main__d1e13463__End"/> had cramp<lb n="c56-0071__main__15"/>ed and narrowed <mdel>it</mdel><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>me untill your gentle <lb n="c56-0071__main__16"/> ness & affection warmed & opened <mdel>it</mdel><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>my senses. and <lb n="c56-0071__main__17"/> now I <metamark function="insert">^</metamark><del loc="c56-0071__main__d1e13514__Start"/>now<del loc="c56-0071__main__d1e13514__End"/> became the same happy creature <lb n="c56-0071__main__18"/> who a few years ago, loving & beloved by <lb n="c56-0071__main__19"/> all, had no sorrow or care – <del loc="c56-0071__main__d1e13524__Start"/>I<del loc="c56-0071__main__d1e13524__End"/><del loc="c56-0071__main__d1e13527__Start"/>and<del loc="c56-0071__main__d1e13527__End"/> when <lb n="c56-0071__main__20"/> happy <mdel>so</mdel><mdel>no</mdel>soul was more fitted than mine <lb n="c56-0071__main__21"/> for feeling delight<del loc="c56-0071__main__d1e13549__Start"/>in<del loc="c56-0071__main__d1e13549__End"/> inanimate nature <metamark function="displacement" xml:id="c56-0071.05">X</metamark><lb n="c56-0071__left_margin__1"/><metamark function="displacement">X</metamark>had the <lb n="c56-0071__left_margin__2"/> power of bes<lb n="c56-0071__left_margin__3"/><del loc="c56-0071__left_margin__d1e13567__Start"/>bo<del loc="c56-0071__left_margin__d1e13567__End"/>towing on <lb n="c56-0071__left_margin__4"/> me the most <lb n="c56-0071__left_margin__5"/> delightful <lb n="c56-0071__left_margin__6"/> sensations — <lb n="c56-0071__main__22"/> A serene sky <del loc="c56-0071__main__d1e13583__Start"/>filled<del loc="c56-0071__main__d1e13583__End"/> and verdant<del loc="c56-0071__main__d1e13586__Start"/>s<del loc="c56-0071__main__d1e13586__End"/> fields <lb n="c56-0071__main__23"/> filled me with extasy.–<mdel>t</mdel>The <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>present season was indeed <lb n="c56-0071__main__24"/> divine – the flowers of spring <del loc="c56-0071__main__d1e13615__Start"/>blossomed<del loc="c56-0071__main__d1e13615__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>bloomed in the <lb n="c56-0071__main__25"/> hedges while those of summer were al<lb n="c56-0071__main__26"/>ready in bud– I <del loc="c56-0071__main__d1e13635__Start"/>dis<del loc="c56-0071__main__d1e13635__End"/> was not disturbed by <lb n="c56-0071__main__27"/> thoughts that during the preceeding <lb n="c56-0071__main__28"/> year pressed upon me not withstand<lb n="c56-0071__main__29"/>ing my endeavours to throw them offwith an invincible burthen.<lb n="c56-0071__main__30"/> Henry <del loc="c56-0071__main__d1e13654__Start"/>a<del loc="c56-0071__main__d1e13654__End"/> rejoiced <del loc="c56-0071__main__d1e13658__Start"/>im<del loc="c56-0071__main__d1e13658__End"/> in my gaiety and <lb n="c56-0071__main__31"/> sincerely sympathized in my <del loc="c56-0071__main__d1e13665__Start"/>joy<del loc="c56-0071__main__d1e13665__End"/>feelings – he exer<lb n="c56-0072__main__1"/>ted himself to amuse me, while he expressed <lb n="c56-0072__main__2"/> the feelings that <del loc="c56-0072__main__d1e13686__Start"/>al<del loc="c56-0072__main__d1e13686__End"/> filled his <del loc="c56-0072__main__d1e13691__Start"/>mind<del loc="c56-0072__main__d1e13691__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>soul. The <lb n="c56-0072__main__3"/> resources of his mind on this occasion <lb n="c56-0072__main__4"/> were truly astonishing. As we rested during <lb n="c56-0072__main__5"/> the sultry heat of noon he invented<lb n="c56-0072__main__6"/> his conversation was full of imagination <lb n="c56-0072__main__7"/> and very often, in imitation of the persi<lb n="c56-0072__main__8"/>an& Arabic writers, he invented tales <lb n="c56-0072__main__9"/> of <del loc="c56-0072__main__d1e13728__Start"/>great<del loc="c56-0072__main__d1e13728__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>wonderful fancy and interrest. At other <lb n="c56-0072__main__10"/> times he repeated my favourite poems <lb n="c56-0072__main__11"/> or drew me out into arguments which <lb n="c56-0072__main__12"/> he supported with great ingenuity.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0072__main__13"/> We returned <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>to our colledge on a sunday – the pea <lb n="c56-0072__main__14"/> sants were dancing and every one we <lb n="c56-0072__main__15"/> met appeared joyful and happy – my <lb n="c56-0072__main__16"/> own spirits were high and I bounded <lb n="c56-0072__main__17"/> along with <del loc="c56-0072__main__d1e13769__Start"/>a<del loc="c56-0072__main__d1e13769__End"/> feelings of <del loc="c56-0072__main__d1e13772__Start"/>hilarity<del loc="c56-0072__main__d1e13772__End"/>unbound <lb n="c56-0072__main__18"/> ed<lb n="c56-0072__left_margin__1"/>unbridled joy and hilarity. <lb n="c56-0072__main__19"/><metamark function="count">20</metamark><lb n="c56-0072__main__20"/><metamark function="count">15</metamark>
